amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-259 to increase funding for the Government Accountability Office (GAO).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Connolly.
